notes:
The SlopeQ for BNC Search Engine provides access to the British National Corpus dataset. 
In addition to linguistically motivated corpus queries, it supports a number of data exploration and 
visualisation features. Most of the functionality of the search engine is available through a 
REST web service.
title: SlopeQ for BNC Search Engine
